ACT
97
Maintenance costs of heirs
What was spent on the support of the heir and on his education will not be included in his inheritance within the limits of the testator's obligation to support and educate the heir.
Whether the expenses made by the testator for the further support and education of the heir will be included in his inheritance and to what extent, will be decided according to the circumstances, taking into account in particular the value of the estate and the costs of education and training for independent living of the other heirs.
